title: OpenTelemetry not setting up correctly

labels.name: triage/wontfix
labels.description: This will not be worked on

body:
### Describe the bug

When starting we get the following warnings and no traces are produced

2023-12-13 14:59:57,546 WARN  [io.qua.ope.run.tra.int.ver.OpenTelemetryVertxTracingFactory$VertxDelegator] (vert.x-eventloop-thread-1) VertxTracer delegate not set. Will not submit this trace. SpanKind: RPC; Request: io.vertx.core.http.impl.HttpRequestHead@4ae4ef8d; Operation:GET.
2023-12-13 14:59:57,664 WARN  [io.qua.ope.run.tra.int.ver.OpenTelemetryVertxTracingFactory$VertxDelegator] (vert.x-eventloop-thread-1) VertxTracer delegate not set. Will not submit this trace. Response: io.vertx.core.http.impl.HttpResponseHead@69db63d3; Failure: null.

2023-12-13 14:59:57,694 WARN  [io.qua.ope.run.tra.int.ver.OpenTelemetryVertxTracingFactory$VertxDelegator] (vert.x-eventloop-thread-1) VertxTracer delegate not set. Will not submit this trace. SpanKind: RPC; Request: io.vertx.core.http.impl.HttpRequestHead@c05b10; Operation:GET.

2023-12-13 14:59:57,809 WARN  [io.qua.ope.run.tra.int.ver.OpenTelemetryVertxTracingFactory$VertxDelegator] (vert.x-eventloop-thread-1) VertxTracer delegate not set. Will not submit this trace. Response: io.vertx.core.http.impl.HttpResponseHead@37ba70bb; Failure: null.
